Text: this isnt the acutal minecraft. It's minedroid, which only renders the map. Plus, on their google repo they have a newer version

i just installed it on my droid x, and actually you can mine and place some blocks. theres very few blocks though. works well. If you want another minecraft clone to check out look up minebuilder in the market
